    • Constructor Detail

      • DFA

        public DFA(java.util.Set<State> states,
           java.util.Set<java.lang.String> alphabet,
           java.util.Map<State,java.util.Map<java.lang.String,State>> transition,
           State start,
           java.util.Set<State> accept)
        Constructs a state with the specified name and label. The activity counter is set to zero.
        Parameters:
        states - the set of states of this DFA
        alphabet - the alphabet of this DFA
        transition - the transition function of this DFA
        start - the start state of this DFA
        accept - the set of accept states of this DFA

    • Method Detail

      • accepts

        public boolean accepts(java.lang.String input)
        Determines whether given string is accepted or rejected by this DFA. Each state's activity counter is initialized to zero, then incremented by one each time the state is entered. Returns true if the string is in the language recognized by this DFA; false otherwise
        Parameters:
        input - The string being tested
        Returns:
        true The string is in the language, false otherwise.
